about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the challenging world of Pyhare, a real-time strategy game that puts you in charge of a village besieged by corrupted monsters. Face dynamic day and night cycles as you struggle to survive and build a powerful relic to contain the evil threatening your home.

During the day, gather resources, upgrade your buildings, and strengthen your villagers. Construct solid defenses and prepare your forces, because when night falls, corrupted monsters emerge from the shadows to besiege your village. Lead your villagers in intense nighttime battles and use clever strategies to withstand enemy onslaughts.

Your main mission is to build a costly relic, the only hope to contain the evil and save your village. Every decision you make is crucial for your survival. Can you complete the relic before the evil consumes everything in its path?

Game Features:


  • Dynamic day and night cycle that affects gameplay and strategies.
  • Resource gathering and continuous upgrades for your villagers and buildings.
  • Intense battles against corrupted monsters during the night.
  • Construction of a powerful relic to contain the evil and save your village.
  • Strategic challenges that test your leadership and decision-making skills.
  • Prepare to face the darkness in Pyhare. The survival of your village is in your hands!
